input_args.passage: 'Wong Jing | Wong Yat-cheong, better known by his stage name as Wong Jing or Barry Wong, is a Hong Kong film director, producer, actor, presenter, and screenwriter.'
input_args.claim: "Source confirms Wong Jing's involvement in the film industry, referring to him as a producer and describing him as one of Hong Kong's most prolific, talented, and controversial filmmakers."
